content.content: 1279×720 514 KB    Core Unit Launch Pod Sessions ||| Session #8: Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit, SES-001 This Wednesday we’ll have @juan and @wouter with us, who’ll be introducing the Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling Core Unit. Here’s its budget and its Facilitator onboarding and yet more documents!  When Time in your local-timezone format: 2021-04-21T17:00:00Z  Where When the time is ripe, follow this Zoom link  Or use this information:  Meeting ID: 829 4277 3725 Passcode: COREUNIT One tap mobile +13017158592,82942773725#,*46651499# US (Washington DC) +13126266799,82942773725#,*46651499# US (Chicago) Dial by your location Find your local number: Zoom International Dial-in Numbers - Zoom  Meeting ID: 829 4277 3725 Passcode: 46651499 attn: @amyjung, @longforwisdom, @davidutro, @flipflopflapdelegate, @malgaph, @_LS, @williamr,  @Prose11, @g_dip , @mrabino1, @planet_x, @hongbiao_li, @smaugho, @krzkaczor, @ejbarraza, @ultraschuppi, @aes
